descript.abstract: The Component Hydric Criteria table lists the hydric soil criteria met for those referenced map unit components that are classified as a "hydric soil."

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Component Hydric Criteria table.

Criterion code for the soil characteristic(s) and/or feature(s) that cause the map unit component to be classified as a "hydric soil." These codes are the paragraph numbers in the hydric soil criteria publication.
The unique identifier of a record in the Component table. Use this column to join the Component Hydric Criteria table to the Component table.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
